```{r libraries, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load_data, message = FALSE, include=FALSE}
teamsBat <- read_csv2(here::here("data_dump/cleanTeamsBat1900_2020"))
teamsPitch <- read_csv2(here::here("data_dump/cleanTeamsPitch1900_2020"))

```


```{r, include=FALSE}
#too many teams to display in one graph currently
teamsBat %>%
  filter(year %in% c(2000:2020)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_boxplot(mapping = aes(x = BA, y = Tm))


```

```{r}

test <- teamsBat %>%
  filter(year >= 1960)

teamnames <- unique(test$Tm)
teamnames

test %>% 
  filter(str_starts(Tm, "Washington") | str_starts(Tm, "Montreal")) %>%
  arrange(Tm)

```


Notable name chnges:
  Tampa Bay Devil Rays -> Tampa Bay Rays
  Los Angeles Angels -> California Angels -> Anaheim Angels -> Los Angles Angels of Anaheim -> Los Angles Angels
  Montreal Expos -> Washington Nationals -> Washington Senators
  Houston Colt .45s -> Houston Astros
  Milwaukee Braves -> Atlanta Braves
  Kansas City Athletics -> Oakland Athletics
  Seattle Pilots -> Milwaukee Brewers
